page.title: 19Survey
page.content:
Results of survey carried out locally:
The average age is 61 years; 75% of which were female. Some examples of their jobs were: Housewife, Playschool Supervisor, Courier & Shop Assistant.
31% of people drive; 37% of residents smoke; 43% of residents keep pets; 31% were married and are now widowed; 31% not married; 38% married; 56% of residents have children, 50% of whom were male and 50% female. The remaining 44% did not have children.
Hobbies included reading, sewing, gardening, music, pottery, writing, swimming, walking, playing bowls and photography. Of all the people interviewed only two said they had no hobby.
